Today, we solemnly mark 103 years since the Armenian Genocide began and remember the 1.5 million Armenians killed between 1915 and 1923. I’m proud to co-sponsor a Senate resolution to commemorate those lost and ensure U.S. acknowledgement of this horrific chapter in history.
